answers.answer: I would talk to your doctor about your concerns, there's a few things like placenta previa, the scar tissue, uterine rupture, etc. that they worry about, but I've had a few friends get pregnant back to back after c-sections and they were just fine. Why were you high risk previously?

i had an emergency c_section with my son he is now 16 months old nd im 31 weeks preggo i got pregnant when he was 9 months my doctor will do my c-section at 37weeks cause my last c,section was an inverted section nd she afraid of an uterine rupture but if wasnt for that she would do it at 39 nd by the way im high risk too..

Thx ladies I had an emergency c section with my first daughter I had preeclampsia and her heart beat dropped also am RH A- my second pregnancy didn't have any problems but still had c section ....it helps knowing your story ty and I go next week to my first appointment with my obgyn :)

question: Hi I jus found out I'm 5 weeks pregnant I have a 5 year old and a 10 month both girls my concern is having a c section so close after my 10 month little girl what are the chances of complications? plus I'm high risk have been every pregnancy..any info would be appreciated ...
title: back to back baby/c section
